title: Pete Hegseth confirmed as Defense Secretary in historic VP tiebreaker vote
summary: Pete Hegseth was confirmed as Defense Secretary in a 51-50 Senate vote, with Vice President JD Vance casting the tie-breaking vote. This marked only the second time in U.S. history that a Cabinet nominee's confirmation was decided by a vice president. Hegseth faced allegations of sexual misconduct, alcohol abuse, and extremist tattoos during his contentious confirmation hearings.
